NK040(thi)050:1: // kun dga' 'bum pa'i bum sgrub gab sprad tshul lo //
NK040(thi)050:4: stong pa ngang las b+h+r+aum yongs su gyur pa las
NK040(thi)050:5: rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i bumapa mtshan
NK040(thi)050:6: nyid dang ldan pa zhabs zhum pa /
NK040(thi)050:11: lha yi gos kyi mgul chings dang /
NK040(thi)050:12: dpag bsam shing gis kha rgyan pa /
NK040(thi)050:13: bcud sna tshogs pas bkang ba rnam rgyal bum pa'i
NK040(thi)050:14: chu'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i lte bar nyi ma
NK040(thi)050:15: dang ro yi steng du +aahmathinga nag yongs gyur pa
NK040(thi)050:17: dung phyur gyis tshogs kyi bskor ba /
NK040(thi)050:18: las bum gyi nang du pad+ma nyi ma ro'i steng du h'u ljang sngon sogs /
NK040(thi)050:20: lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor /
NK040(thi)050:21: mgrin par +aah thugs kar h'u las 'od zer dang
NK040(thi)050:22: bcas pa'i rang bzhin gyi gnas nas bla ma yi
NK040(thi)050:23: dam mkha' lha tshogs ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs
NK040(thi)050:24: / h'u h+r+aih chos dbyings mi 'gyur sogs /
NK040(thi)050:25: dzahmh'u bam hoh ma lus sems can sogs /
NK040(thi)050:26: pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)050:28: slar yang thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas
NK040(thi)050:29: rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dbang gi lha rigs sogs
NK040(thi)050:30: / h+r+aihah bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la don yod grub pas dbu brgyan /
NK040(thi)050:32: h'u h+r+auih bde chen lhun gyis grub pa'i sogs nas /
NK040(thi)050:34: mchod pa byin rlabs gzhung nas /
NK040(thi)050:35: badz+ra push+pe sman raka gtor gsum brlab /
NK040(thi)050:36: h'u h+r+aih yon chab khrus chab sogs /
NK040(thi)050:37: sku lnga lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NK040(thi)050:43: bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer bcas te bum lha'i thugs brgyud bskul nas /
NK040(thi)050:44: sku gsung thugs las bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas bum
NK040(thi)050:45: pa gang bar bsam la mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i sngags
NK040(thi)050:48: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h'u phata /
NK040(thi)050:50: lha rnams 'od du zhu nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur /
NK040(thi)050:51: des bum bzlas kyi rim pa chad lhag med par grub snyam /
